tool_description:
This API implements the two-phase-algorithm in its fully developed form.
It solves a given 3x3 Rubik Cube for optimal solution. It is also possible to find the optimal solution to solve the cube for a specific target pattern. Further the API can be used to return a random rubik cube and its solution.
name: Optimal Rubik Cube 3x3
title: Optimal Rubik Cube 3x3

api_list.name: requestQuickSolve
api_list.description: Requires an input schema (see API description for rubik cube notation).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://optimal-rubik-cube-3x3.p.rapidapi.com/quicksolve/UDBRUFLLBUDRFRFFBUDBLDFLDLULULUDDFRRRBBFLRDBFDLFUBRBUR"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "optimal-rubik-cube-3x3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://optimal-rubik-cube-3x3.p.rapidapi.com/quicksolve/{cubestring}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "optimal-rubik-cube-3x3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: requestRandom
api_list.description: You can use the response as input for the other endpoints
